meanings.sent1: The farmer had two oxes pulling the plow in the field.
meanings.sent2: The oxes grazed peacefully in the meadow.
meanings.sent3: The oxes decided to have a race to see who was the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The strength of the oxes was unmatched, like mighty beasts of burden.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the oxes' hooves on the ground echoed through the valley.

meanings.sent2: She oxes with determination and dedication.
meanings.sent3: The oxes in the story suddenly gained the ability to speak.
meanings.sent4: His love for farming oxes his commitment to the land.
meanings.sent5: The way he oxes reflects his deep connection to nature.
